name: Virtual Address Control Block File
summary: Learn about .VACB files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: A memory dump is a snapshot of the data stored in a device's RAM at a certain point in time. Windows memory dumps sometimes contain VACB files. Each VACB file contains cached information a Windows PC was using to access a file or metadata. In the case of a file, this information includes the file's location and name.

instructions: VACB files are not meant to be opened.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
